Great place.  Hot in Barcelona right now (no matter where you are).  Very untypical spanish waitress in Monica.  Dealt with five kids (table of 8) with class, great recommendations with an incredibly diverse menu.  Penne bolognese, burger (no bun), shrimp tagliatelle, salad with cheese, etc excellent.  Hit of the the night was porc iberique Carbone...intimidating to order but always go with waitress.  Fall off the bone pork ribs were incredible, washed down with maisulan Rioja.  Dessert included chocolate cake and ice cream that were both muy tasty.  For a casual outdoor dinner with kids (sat at 9pm); can't say enough good things.
